languages.text: "Мы расчистили путь для новых выскочек, которые будут рваться занять освободившееся место. А значит — дали им повод усердствовать в новых расправах над мон-кай. Как иронично".

traits.locale_text: "Мы расчистили путь для новых выскочек, которые будут рваться занять освободившееся место. А значит — дали им повод усердствовать в новых расправах над мон-кай. Как иронично".

languages.text: "We have cleared a path for new upstarts who will want to take their place. Which means we gave them the motivation to wreak new carnage on the mon-keigh. The irony."
languages.original_text: "Мы расчистили путь для новых выскочек, которые будут рваться занять освободившееся место. А значит — дали им повод усердствовать в новых расправах над мон-кай. Как иронично".

traits.locale_text: "We have cleared a path for new upstarts who will want to take their place. Which means we gave them the motivation to wreak new carnage on the mon-keigh. The irony."
"We have cleared a path for new upstarts who will want to take their place. Which means we gave them the motivation to wreak new carnage on the mon-keigh. The irony."

"We have cleared a path for new upstarts who will want to take their place. Which means we gave them the motivation to wreak new carnage on the mon-keigh. The irony."
"We have cleared a path for new upstarts who will want to take their place. Which means we gave them the motivation to wreak new carnage on the mon-keigh. The irony."

languages.text: 「俺たちは、奴らの後釜を狙う新たな成り上がりどもに道を開けてやったんだ。つまり、モン＝ケイに新たな虐殺を引き起こす動機を与えたってわけだ。皮肉なことにな」
languages.original_text: "We have cleared a path for new upstarts who will want to take their place. Which means we gave them the motivation to wreak new carnage on the mon-keigh. The irony."

traits.locale_text: 「俺たちは、奴らの後釜を狙う新たな成り上がりどもに道を開けてやったんだ。つまり、モン＝ケイに新たな虐殺を引き起こす動機を与えたってわけだ。皮肉なことにな」

languages.text: "Wir haben neuen Emporkömmlingen einen Weg gebahnt, die ihren Platz einnehmen wollen. Und ihnen damit die Motivation gegeben, ein neues Gemetzel an den Chem-Pan-Sey zu verüben. Was für eine Ironie."
languages.original_text: "We have cleared a path for new upstarts who will want to take their place. Which means we gave them the motivation to wreak new carnage on the mon-keigh. The irony."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben neuen Emporkömmlingen einen Weg gebahnt, die ihren Platz einnehmen wollen. Und ihnen damit die Motivation gegeben, ein neues Gemetzel an den Chem-Pan-Sey zu verüben. Was für eine Ironie."

languages.text: « Nous avons ouvert la voie à d'autres arrivistes qui voudront prendre leur place. En d'autres termes, nous les avons motivés à faire de nouveau couler le sang des mon-keigh. Quelle ironie. »
languages.original_text: "We have cleared a path for new upstarts who will want to take their place. Which means we gave them the motivation to wreak new carnage on the mon-keigh. The irony."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons ouvert la voie à d'autres arrivistes qui voudront prendre leur place. En d'autres termes, nous les avons motivés à faire de nouveau couler le sang des mon-keigh. Quelle ironie. »

languages.text: «Sí, hemos despejado el camino para otros advenedizos que quieran ocupar su lugar. Lo que significa que los hemos motivado para seguir masacrando a los mon-keigh. Qué ironía».
languages.original_text: "We have cleared a path for new upstarts who will want to take their place. Which means we gave them the motivation to wreak new carnage on the mon-keigh. The irony."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, hemos despejado el camino para otros advenedizos que quieran ocupar su lugar. Lo que significa que los hemos motivado para seguir masacrando a los mon-keigh. Qué ironía».

languages.text: “那些人的位置空了出来，很多人已经迫不及待想取而代之了。也就是说，他们又有了新的动力去屠杀猴子，这还真是挺讽刺的。”
languages.original_text: "We have cleared a path for new upstarts who will want to take their place. Which means we gave them the motivation to wreak new carnage on the mon-keigh. The irony."

traits.locale_text: “那些人的位置空了出来，很多人已经迫不及待想取而代之了。也就是说，他们又有了新的动力去屠杀猴子，这还真是挺讽刺的。”

languages.text: "Sayemizde yerlerine yenileri türeyecek, yine mon-keighleri katledecekler ve ortalık kan gölüne dönecek. Tam bir ironi."
languages.original_text: "We have cleared a path for new upstarts who will want to take their place. Which means we gave them the motivation to wreak new carnage on the mon-keigh. The irony."

traits.locale_text: "Sayemizde yerlerine yenileri türeyecek, yine mon-keighleri katledecekler, ortalık kan gölüne dönecek. Tam bir ironi."

languages.original_text: "We have cleared a path for new upstarts who will want to take their place. Which means we gave them the motivation to wreak new carnage on the mon-keigh. The irony."
